notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: J.J.C., W.D.H. and A.C.L. supervised the experiments. R.N.H., S.H., E.D., Z.G., G.B., M.E. and J.J.C. performed the experiments. W.D.H. and M.E. provided technical assistance. R.N.H., E.D. and J.J.C. wrote the main manuscript text. R.N.H., S.H., E.D. and J.J.C. prepared Figure 1. R.N.H., E.D., Z.G. and J.J.C. prepared Figures 2â€“5 and Supplemental Figure. 1. All authors reviewed the manuscript.
